info.title: Crevio API
info.description: The Crevio API allows you to programmatically manage your creator storefront â€” products, pricing, checkouts, orders, customers, and more.

get.description: Returns information about the authenticated account
Returns a list of published products for the current account
Returns detailed information about a specific product
Returns all price variants for the current account. Optionally filter by product.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: Filter price variants by product prefix ID

get.description: Returns a specific price variant
Returns reviews for products in the current account. Optionally filter by product.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: Filter reviews by product prefix ID

get.description: Returns a specific review

post.description: Creates a new checkout session for purchasing products

get.description: Returns a specific checkout session
Returns a specific cart
Returns a paginated list of orders for the current account

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Comma-separated relations to expand: line_items, customer, discount, access_tokens, seller_account, charge

get.description: Returns a specific order

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Comma-separated relations to expand: line_items, customer, discount, access_tokens, seller_account, charge

get.description: Returns a paginated list of customers for the current account
Returns a specific customer
Returns a paginated list of discounts for the current account
Returns a specific discount
Returns a paginated list of checkout links for the current account

post.description: Creates a new shareable checkout link

get.description: Returns a specific checkout link
Returns a paginated list of experiences for the current account

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by experience type (e.g. Community, Course, Download)

get.description: Returns a specific experience
Returns a paginated list of published blog posts
Returns a specific published blog post

ApiKeyAuth.name: Authorization
ApiKeyAuth.description: API key in the format: Bearer {api_token}

discountedFromAmount.description: Original price in cents for showing a discount

presetAmount.description: Preset amount in cents for pay-what-you-want pricing

minimumAmount.description: Minimum amount in cents for pay-what-you-want pricing

maximumAmount.description: Maximum amount in cents for pay-what-you-want pricing

intervalCount.description: Number of intervals between subscription billings

revokeAfterDays.description: Automatically revoke access after this many days

waitlist.description: Whether waitlist is enabled for this variant

benefits.description: List of benefit descriptions for this variant

customerName.description: Name of the customer who wrote the review

customerId.description: Associate cart with an existing customer

_destroy.description: Set to true to remove item

charge.description: Included when expand=charge. Contains Stripe charge details.

amountOff.description: Discount amount in cents (required if discount_type=amount_off)

priceVariants.description: Limit discount to specific price variant IDs

products.description: Products associated with this checkout link

qrCode.description: QR code image for the checkout link

featuredImage.description: Featured image for the blog post

socialMediaImage.description: Social media sharing image for the blog post

active.description: Whether this social link is active
